settings.title: Getting you ready for your next great adventure.
settings.subtitle: Trek Hardware stock the widest range of offroad parts in Australia. We stock an extensive range of 4x4 accessories, camping, trailer parts and more.

settings.title: Something off-road for everyone.
settings.content: Trek Hardware stocks the widest range of off-road gear Australia-wide. We've got everything, from 4wd accessories, to camping gear and Trailer Parts.

settings.title: Our Approach
settings.text: At Trek Hardware, our approach is to be the one-stop shop for off-road parts and accessories in Australia. We provide the widest range of outdoor parts in Australia, stocking quality parts from a wide range of the best brands.

settings.title: Enthusiast-owned and run.
settings.text: We're not just another retailer. We're very passionate about everything outdoors and we know our stuff! Come have a chat with any of our highly-knowledgeable staff.

settings.title: Physical Store Locations
settings.text: Walk in locations are available near you, so you can come in and browse in person if that's what you prefer! If we're not close to you, our entire product range is online and available to be shipped straight to your door.

settings.title: One stop shop
settings.text: We stock the widest range of off-road parts and accessories in Australia. No more picking and choosing from 4 different places, we've probably got it, and at a great price.

settings.title: Meet our Portland crew
settings.text: Whether it's running, dancing, yoga, pilates, boxing, or trampolining - we all loveÂ moving, and believe that movement heals your soul. We are a dynamic crew of likeminded folks who care about the wellness of others in our community. We love partnering with other locals for events and collaborations, and are always open to new ideas. We focus on bringing people together in our space where everybody is always welcome.

settings.title: Our Product Range
settings.content: Trek Hardware has a wide product range to take care of all your outdoor needs. Choose from the categories below to browse from the widest range of outdoor parts in Australia.

settings.title: What is your handling time?
settings.subtitle:
Delivery charges may occur on some items bought. There can be a wait time of up to 3 days on specific items such as branded items, but not limited to
ie. complete axles, suspensions, bullbars,Â toolboxes, cages, etc.

settings.title: How do I determine what hub stud pattern I have?
settings.subtitle:
The measurement is taken from centre of the stud to centre of stud, either to the right or left.

- If the measurement is 65mm centre to centre stud, the Hub Stud Pattern is Holden HT
- If the measurement is 68mm centre to centre stud, the Hub Stud Pattern isÂ Ford
- If the measurement isÂ 72mm centre to centre stud, the Hub Stud Pattern is Holden HQ

settings.title: How do I measure axle size?
settings.subtitle: The measurement is taken from face to face, as in where the face of the wheel needs to sit. If you have existing wheels or buying else where, we require the measurement of the wheel to get the accurate length of the axle. However you are able to get wheels from us and we can work out the accurate length of axle required ourselves.
